Sentencas: With the development of SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) technology, especially in terms of cell manufacture and stack assembly, recent SOFC research has focused on system integration and control.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: Various SOFC system configurations presented in the literature can be applied to various application scenarios for their unique advantages.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: A thorough evaluation and comparison of those SOFC systems in terms of performance, cost and efficiency is very important for optimal system design, taking the environment and conditions into consideration.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: In this paper, four typical 10 kW-scale SOFC-based systems are investigated, a hydrogen-fueled SOFC system, an extemal steam-reforming SOFC system, an SOFC/gas turbine hybrid system and SOFC/SOEC (solid oxide electrolysis cell) combined system.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: First, physical system models were constructed according to physical conservation laws and chemical kinetics and validated using experimental data.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: In addition, an exergoeconomic analysis was carried out based on these models.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: Then the optimal operating points of the four systems, which can be used for system performance comparison under the same operating conditions, are acquired through a multiple-objective optimization process based on an improved genetic particle swarm optimization algorithm.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: Then the systems were compared in aspects of technical and exergoeconomic performance under the same net output power, and comprehensive system marking was performed.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: Finally, analysis and predictions of application scenarios for these systems were proposed based on the scores.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations

Sentencas: This paper provides a theoretical foundation for the design, analysis and application of SOFC systems.
Titulo: Application oriented multiple-objective optimization, analysis and comparison of solid oxide fuel cell systems with different configurations
